title: Provides that a sponsoring agency must make a presentation at a public hearing before a residential facility for the disabled may be placed in a municipality
summary: Provides that a sponsoring agency must make a presentation at a public hearing before a residential facility for the disabled may be placed in a municipality.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         2517

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 19, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  M.  of  A.  FITZPATRICK -- read once and referred to the
         Committee on Mental Health

       AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to requiring a spon-
         soring agency to make  a  presentation  to  a  municipality  prior  to
         consideration of placement of a residential facility for the disabled

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Paragraph 2 of subdivision (c)  of  section  41.34  of  the
    2  mental  hygiene  law, as amended by chapter 1024 of the laws of 1981, is
    3  amended to read as follows:
    4    (2) Prior to forwarding a response to the sponsoring  agency  and  the
    5  commissioner,  the  municipality  may  hold a public hearing pursuant to
    6  local law.  SHOULD THE MUNICIPALITY DECIDE TO HOLD A PUBLIC HEARING, THE
    7  SPONSORING AGENCY SHALL MAKE A PRESENTATION, USING APPROPRIATE AUDIO-VI-
    8  SUAL TECHNOLOGY, AT WHICH THE SPONSORING AGENCY SHALL PRESENT THE HISTO-
    9  RY AND BACKGROUND OF THE SPONSORING AGENCY, THE NUMBER OF EMPLOYEES  WHO
   10  WILL BE WORKING AT THE RESIDENTIAL FACILITY, THE NUMBER OF RESIDENTS WHO
   11  WILL BE LIVING IN THE RESIDENTIAL FACILITY, AND AN OUTLINE OF ANY STRUC-
   12  TURAL   CHANGES WHICH WILL BE MADE TO EXISTING BUILDINGS ON THE PREMISES
   13  WHERE IT IS PROPOSED THAT THIS FACILITY BE LOCATED.
   14    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.




        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD02404-01-1
